alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 4:57PM CDT until August 24 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Lowndes. * WHEN...Until 800 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 457 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen over a short period of time. Additional heavy rain is approaching the advisory area from the southwest. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fort Deposit, Mosses, Hayneville, Gordonville, Beechwood, Lowndes County Airport, Logan, Calhoun, Mount Willing, Clover Hill, Letohatchee, Fostoria, Collirene and Farmersville.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
